modName: Dremora Overhaul Mod Skyrim Remasted Edition
summary:
Dremora Overhaul Mod Skyrim Remasted Edition
This mod allows you to play as a Dremora. You can Massively customize him or her to you liking. There is face paints, Dremora Horns and hair styles.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=6][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] Overhaul Mod For [url=https://elderscrolls.bethesda.net/skyrim]Skyrim[/url] Remasted

There will be one more update then i will not be updating this mod.

[/size][size=5]Please note that this Mod will not be Releasing DLC's and updates only the  [b][i][size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1314/]Dremora Overhaul Mod Skyrim Special Edition[/url] will.[/size][/i][/b][/size]

[size=3]Click here For Special Edition Version > [url=https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=2&ved=0ahUKEwijmZ6a6YHQAhVIJZQKHSLECt0QFgghMAE&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrimspecialedition%2Fmods%2F1314%2F%3Ftab%3D3%26navtag%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.nexusmods.com%252Fskyrimspecialedition%252Fajax%252Fmodimages%252F%253Fuser%253D0%2526id%253D1314%2526gid%253D1704&usg=AFQjCNGGuCVRu2-Wu1P56GSYrybaIJQlsA&sig2=8Bl4jzhkB7CYdpcKd1KzHw&bvm=bv.137132246,d.dGo&cad=rja]Dremora Overhaul Mod Skyrim Special Edition[/url][/size]


[/i][/b]
This mod allows you to play as a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url]. You can Massively customize him or her to you liking. There is face paints, [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] Horns and hair styles.
To play as a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] use [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)]Console[/url] ShowRaceMenu or a mod to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/]ShowRaceMenu[/url].

[b][u][size=3](Modder)[/size][/u][/b]
Want to fight [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url]'s, Type in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)]Console[/url] [b][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url]Test[/b], This will show the code to spawn 1 code to spawn all the types of [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] randomly. Please note that the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] are more advanced then your usual Skyrim fights. They have classes. Tank, Necromancer, NightBlade, IceMage, FireMage and StormMage.

[b][u][size=4]Oh did i say you are the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dragonborn]Dragonborn[/url] as well? YES THATS RIGHT!! Custom voices made for shouts for the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] male and female![/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=6][i] Please Report All Errors! [/i][/size][/color][/u][/b]

[youtube]pJSKtzxq11A[/youtube]
[youtube]o9vBH9lcl-A[/youtube]

[size=4][b]Feel free to post photos or make a video ;)[/b]
[/size][size=4]Remember to endorse if you like this mod :D [/size]



[i][b][u][size=6]Feel Free to visit my Skyrim mods page and my YouTube.[/size][/u][/b][/i]
